Syntax
[TangerineAllowedParentTypes(new Type[]{typeof(Node3D), typeof(Viewport3D)})]
[TangerineAllowedChildrenTypes(new Type[]{typeof(Node)})]
[TangerineVisualHintGroup("/All/Nodes/Containers", null)]
